titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Spiroxamine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on 8-(1,1-dimethylethyl)-N-ethyl-N-propyl-1,4-diozaspiro[4,5]decane-2-methanamine (Spiroxamine).
